745E.description: Mobile and Ergonomic Pallet Strapping System

includedFeatures.name: Standard Tool-Lift
includedFeatures.description: Standard for pallets >80cm with sealing head quick release included

includedFeatures.name: Sledge 85
includedFeatures.description: Standard sledge 85 included for clearance height >95mm

includedFeatures.name: Pallet Width Adjustment
includedFeatures.description: Easy adjustment with pin system. Set to pallet width + 20cm

includedFeatures.name: Electric Joystick Control
includedFeatures.description: Precise electrical control via ergonomic joystick

includedFeatures.name: Sealing Head Pre-Installed
includedFeatures.description: Sealing head installed and mounted on system

includedFeatures.name: 6m Standard Chain
includedFeatures.description: 6-meter standard chain length with 40m/min speed

optionalAccessories.name: Triplex-Tool-Lift (TTL)
optionalAccessories.description: Ideal for pallets lower than 80cm. Suitable for pallets as low as 10cm

optionalAccessories.name: Alternative Sledges
optionalAccessories.description: Sledge 47 (55-95mm), 47S (narrow 160mm), 47L (up to 40mm)

optionalAccessories.name: Strap-Brake-Relief
optionalAccessories.description: Essential for pallets higher than 120cm

optionalAccessories.name: Headpiece with Bumper
optionalAccessories.description: For pallets with overhang of max. 40mm

optionalAccessories.name: Line Laser Type 2
optionalAccessories.description: Precision positioning system for optimal alignment

optionalAccessories.name: Additional Chain Length
optionalAccessories.description: Add up to 2m extra chain (8m total)

optionalAccessories.name: Spare Battery Pack
optionalAccessories.description: 24V lead-fleece battery for multiple shifts

optionalAccessories.name: Mobile Overheight Module (MOHM)
optionalAccessories.description: For pallets higher than 230cm, up to 305cm

optionalAccessories.name: Mobile Sledge Tunnel
optionalAccessories.description: For goods strapped on scantlings. One pair includes two tunnels

optionalAccessories.name: Stationary Sledge Tunnel
optionalAccessories.description: Adjustable sledge tunnel for different widths

optionalAccessories.name: Sealing Head Quick Release
optionalAccessories.description: Adapter to release sealing head from Tool-Lift

745X.description: Professional Mobile Pallet Strapping System with Advanced Lithium-Ion Technology

includedFeatures.name: Standard Tool-Lift
includedFeatures.description: Standard for pallets >80cm with sealing head quick release included

includedFeatures.name: Line Laser Type 2
includedFeatures.description: Precision positioning system INCLUDED in X-pert Line

includedFeatures.name: Siemens Industry Touchscreen
includedFeatures.description: Professional-grade touchscreen for easy settings and pallet width configuration

includedFeatures.name: Sledge 85
includedFeatures.description: Standard sledge 85 included for clearance height >95mm

includedFeatures.name: Electric Joystick Control
includedFeatures.description: Precise electrical control via ergonomic joystick

includedFeatures.name: Sealing Head Pre-Installed
includedFeatures.description: Sealing head installed and mounted with professional-grade precision

includedFeatures.name: 6m High-Speed Chain
includedFeatures.description: 6-meter chain with ultra-fast 66m/min speed for maximum productivity

includedFeatures.name: Lithium-Ion Battery & Charger
includedFeatures.description: Advanced Lithium-Ion battery (5kg, 1200 cycles) with wide-range fast charger (3.5h)

optionalAccessories.name: Triplex-Tool-Lift (TTL)
optionalAccessories.description: Ideal for pallets lower than 80cm. Suitable for pallets as low as 10cm

optionalAccessories.name: Alternative Sledges
optionalAccessories.description: Sledge 47 (55-95mm), 47S (narrow 160mm), 47L (up to 40mm)

optionalAccessories.name: Strap-Brake-Relief
optionalAccessories.description: Essential for pallets higher than 120cm

optionalAccessories.name: Headpiece with Bumper
optionalAccessories.description: For pallets with overhang of max. 40mm

optionalAccessories.name: Easy Move Assistant
optionalAccessories.description: Premium X-pert feature for easier handling and longer distances

optionalAccessories.name: Additional Chain Length
optionalAccessories.description: Add up to 2m extra chain (8m total)

optionalAccessories.name: Spare Lithium-Ion Battery
optionalAccessories.description: Additional battery pack for 24/7 operation

optionalAccessories.name: Screen Protector
optionalAccessories.description: Protect the Siemens touchscreen from industrial damage

optionalAccessories.name: Mobile Overheight Module (MOHM)
optionalAccessories.description: For pallets higher than 230cm, up to 305cm

optionalAccessories.name: Mobile Sledge Tunnel
optionalAccessories.description: For goods strapped on scantlings. One pair includes two tunnels

optionalAccessories.name: Stationary Sledge Tunnel
optionalAccessories.description: Adjustable sledge tunnel for different widths

optionalAccessories.name: Sealing Head Quick Release
optionalAccessories.description: Adapter to release sealing head from Tool-Lift

advantages: 3.4x MORE CYCLES: 1200 vs 350 strapping cycles per charge
SIEMENS TOUCHSCREEN: Easy digital settings vs manual pin adjustment
LINE LASER INCLUDED: Precision positioning system standard
